fun_facts: Did you know that on your birthday, the Earth is exactly 365.25 days away from the same position it was the year before?
Your birth year might have experienced a historical event! For example, if you were born in 1989, the Berlin Wall fell.
On your birthday, thousands of other people around the world are also celebrating their birthdays! You're not alone!
Depending on the year, your birthday may coincide with different public holidays or special events in various countries.
Did you know that the probability of sharing your birthday with someone else is higher than you think? It's around 1 in 365!
The most common birthday month is September, and the least common is February.
